amendment.description: To permanently and fully equalize the standardized payment rate beginning in fiscal year 2004.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1020 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 1020 proposed by Senator Conrad. (consideration: CR S8415-8416, S8417; text: CR S8415-8416) To permanently and fully equalize the standardized payment rate beginning in fiscal year 2004.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1020 proposed by Senator Conrad.
